original_title: DC gun permit process slashed to days under Trump federal task force | Fox News
article_summary: President Donald Trump's crime crackdown in Washington, D.C. includes streamlining the gun permitting process for law-abiding residents, reducing the average permit processing time from several months to just five days. The concealed carry permit process has also been streamlined, now taking 4.6 days to obtain, according to data from the Making DC Safe and Beautiful Task Force.</s>
